snippet: The embassies of Armenia and Azerbaijan in Washington discuss the conflict over Nagorno-Karabakh.
abstract: Letter from Elin Suleymanov, ambassador of Azerbaijan, comments on Sept 10 Op-Ed article by Brenda Shaffer about Russia's involvement in conflict between Armenia and Azerbaijan.
lead_paragraph: The embassies of Armenia and Azerbaijan in Washington discuss the conflict over Nagorno-Karabakh.

headline.main: Armenia and Azerbaijan, Engaged in a War of Words
headline.print_headline: Armenia and Azerbaijan, Engaged in a War of Words
